name: Spring Time
description:
Gamepad recommended, pull the left stick towards the ground and release to spring away. Please enjoy!

Created at Fuse Jam 2 with the theme Loneliness and the Boing sound.

Character Art by Chris Rowley (Froduck42)

Environment Art by Douglas Flinders (@douglasflinders) and Claire Morley (@shimmerwitch)

Code by James Wood (@jctwood) and Chris McMath (@chrismcmath)

Music by Josh Shepherd (@Arkistrate) and Henry Pullan (@henwuar)

Design by everyone and Jack
